page.title: 06RELIGION
page.content: The three churches in the block,St.Laurence at Morland,St.Barnabus at Gt. Strickland and St.Cuthbert at Cliburn are very much alive and playing a very active part in village life. Morland Church is the Parish church of a huge rural parish stretching from Kings Meaburn to the motorway and including ST.Barnabus a sister church in this parish. St.Cuthbert is part of the United Benefice of Clifton,Brougham,Cliburn and Bolton with the vicar living at Clifton. All three churches are in a good state of maintenance and are beautifully kept.In the case of large rural parishes like these much depends on the active support of lay people and this is very much so in the runningof all the churches in the area
